name: Ghostemane Pentacles
description:
Ghostemane Pentacles, is a Fun & Simple Endless Marathon of Addictive Retro Gaming Inspired App Game. @Ghostemane & @Rapsmyinitials
Bring to you, classic marathon style retro gaming at its finest !!
Simply collect Pentacle's by tapping anywhere on the screen to jump once & double tap for two jumps per leap. Time your jump to land on platforms & don't fall into the fire! Watch out for the pesky Demon. Farthest distance travelled + Pentacles collected increases your score. Highest score to unlock additional music & special Ghostemane Paranormal Board! Compete worldwide with the Game Center leaderboard + post your score. Now with bonus characters! We hope to keep you coming back for more to beat your highest score!
